amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in the Congressional Record of may 7, 1996, to prohibit the use of any funds authorized in the bill for the purpose of funding the relocation of public housing residents and applicants from Baltimore City, Maryland, to other jurisdictions in the State of Maryland if such relocation is a result of litigation brought by public housing residents of Baltimore City concerning the demolition of certain public housing units in that city.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Ehrlich amendment was withdrawn.
